PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-13292024-12-16TBS
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Government Contracts Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the GOVERNMENT CONTRACTS REGULATIONS in order to exempt the following two types of contracts from the bid requirements of the Regulations: (i) contracts in respect of which a national security exception has been properly invoked under the law, and (ii) contracts between the Government of Canada and a government entity.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0273 Publication Date: 2025-01-01
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the GOVERNMENT CONTRACTS REGULATIONS in order to exempt the following two types of contracts from the bid requirements of the Regulations: (i) contracts in respect of which a national security exception has been properly invoked under the law, and (ii) contracts between the Government of Canada and a government entity.
